alert.note: Alert for Cleveland; Oklahoma (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 10 at 3:01AM CDT until June 10 at 8:00AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 AM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN OKLAHOMA AND NORTHEASTERN CLEVELAND COUNTIES... At 301 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Midwest City, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Eastern Oklahoma City, northeastern Norman, Midwest City, Del City, Choctaw, Harrah, Spencer, Jones, Nicoma Park, Valley Brook, Stella, Tinker Air Force Base, Stanley Draper Lake, Forest Park, Lake Aluma and Smith Village. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
